treatment_1.title: TEETH WHITENING
treatment_1.description:
Lighten your teeth with Zoom Power Bleaching at Eram Dental Health Clinic

Whiter, brighter teeth are a quick and effective way to transform your smile and boost your appearance
At Eram Dental Health Clinic we offer only the moste effective and healthy teeht whitening system, that are proven to lighten your teeth by several shades.
Many patients complain of discoloured, stained or dull teeth. This change in colour can be due to a number of reasons such as age, smoking, certain food and drink and various medications.
Teeth whitening treatment restores the brightness to your teeth and is a perfectly safe and proven method of improving your smile. This is a fantastic and simple way to enhance your smile.
At Eram Dental Health Clinic, we offer two different teeth whitening systems.
Philips Zoom Power Bleaching
The most advanced, professional In-Practice bleaching system.
At Eram Dental Health Clinic, the teeth whitening is carried out completely by our dental professionals. We guarantee our patients highest quality standards and amazing results. The result is more intense and can be achieved in just 1h to 1 1/2 hours. The Zoom Power Bleaching is developed and proven to be harmless to your teeth and gums.
The specially developed blue LED light optimally supports the decolorization of color molecules, so that your can enjoy your most beautful smile.
Home Bleaching Kit
We offer patients tray based whitening kits which you can use at home at your convenience. When you attend Eram Dental Health Clinic we will take impressions of your teeth so that we can create your whitening trays. We will then show you how to apply the whitening gel to the tray and advise how long you will need to wear the trays for.
Following treatment, we will arrange a follow up appointment so that we can ensure you are happy with the results.
Please click hear or call +41/44 222 21 11 to book your appointment for your beautiful, white smile.

treatment_2.title: Invisalign
treatment_2.description:
Virtually invisible and removable, you can enjoy a straighter smile with Invisalign orthodontic treatment.

Eram Dental Health Clinic  I  Premium Invisalign Provider

If you have crooked or protruding teeth and would like to change the positioning, we offer Invisalign – a discrete orthodontic appliance that can treat both aesthetic and functional orthodontic issues.

Designed for patients seeking a discrete way of improving the positon of their teeth, Invisalign is a removable clear brace system that is almost invisible to the eye.

The aligners are more comfortable than a fixed brace and you can remove them to eat drink and clean – therefore having a minimum impact on your daily life.

Benefits of Invisalign

We offer our patients the following cosmetic dentistry solutions:

  • Suitable for patients over the age of 16
  • Barely noticeable, transparent aligners
  • Quick and efficient treatment
  • Used worldwide with proven results
  • Patients can see the end results prior to treatment with our advanced technology
  • We offer helpful finance plans so you can spread the cost of treatment

The treatment

Treatment is provided through a series of transparent aligners (which are similar to mouth guards). The Invisalign aligner is changed every two weeks. Each aligner has been designed to encourage the progressive movement of your teeth into the end position to give you a great looking smile, making you feel more confident and happy.

Another great advantage of Invisalign is that patients can see the potential results before starting treatment. With Invisalign’s Clincheck technology you will see how your teeth are likely to look like if you choose Invsialign orthodontic treatment – giving you more confidence and reassurance about your future new smile.

Invisalign aligners are created specifically for you by our laboratory and once you have completed treatment we can provide a retainer which you will wear to maintain the new position of your teeth.

 

What is clincheck?

Clincheck is Invisaligns own 3D animated treatment plan that is created following your full consultation or Invisalign records visit.

Following your Invisalign records visit, the moulds we take of your teeth are shipped to the Invisalign laboratory where they are scanned into a special scanning machine to create a 3D model of your teeth

 

From there, our Orthodontic Specialist, Dr. Stefano Troiani, will work alongside the team at Invisalign to create the custom 3D animation of your treatment plan.

Please click here or call +41/44 222 21 11 to book your appointment.

treatment_3.title: Orthodontic Treatment
treatment_3.description:
We offer orthodontic treatment for kids & adults who want to achieve a straighter, more symmetrical and healthy smile.

With over 8’000 documented treatments, Eram Dental Health Clinic is leading in all kind of orthodontic treatments in Switzerland. Our cases are used for various lectures all around the world.

Thanks to our Orthodontic Specialists, at Eram Dental Health Clinic we’re able to offer our patients a number of different treatments, such as traditional metal braces, ceramic braces, aesthetic braces, lingual system and deamon system.

Benefits of orthodontic treatment

  • Straighter teeth and more uniform smile
  • Improves dental function and bite problems
  • Faster treatment time than traditional braces
  • Designed for comfort and ease of wear
  • We offer finance plans so you can spread the cost of treatment

 

Children Orthodontics

Removable appliances: these can be placed on one or two arches and are aimed at the proper development of the child’s jawbones.

Brackets: metal brackets are usually used when teeth are crowded or to make space so that new teeth will come in properly

Adult Orthodontics

The option of brackets – whether metal or aesthetic – is also feasible in adult patients, although we always try to offer the most convenient and aesthetic option so that the patient can live a normal life.

Therefore, at Eram Dental Health Clinic we can offer all kind of orthodontic treatments for Kids, Teenagers and Adults.

treatment_4.title: Smile Makeover
treatment_4.description:
A Smile Makeover can change the way you see yourself and enhance your confidence, helping you to smile and communicate more openly.

Over the years, Eram Dental Health Clinic has become the Nr. 1 Clinic for Smile Makeovers. Patients from around the world visit Eram Dental Health Clinic to get their unique and individual smile.

Many patients express dissatisfaction with their smile, whether this is due to the colour or shape of their teeth, the alignment or protrusion. At Broseley Dental Practice we offer a range of cosmetic dentistry procedures to rejuvenate your teeth and improve your appearance.

A Smile Makeover is your first step towards achieving the smile you have always wanted.

Benefits of a Smile Makeover at Eram Dental Health Clinic

We offer our patients the following cosmetic dentistry solutions:

  • Our Smile Makeover Experts will take the time to discuss your concerns and will only suggest the right treatment to meet your needs.
  • We can re-design your smile and will support you to choose a cosmetic dental treatment.
  • Our dentists are highly trained and experienced in cosmetic dentistry.
  • Our own dental technician fullfills all whishes from the patients the guarantee your individual Art Work Smile.
  • You can attend an initial consultation without any obligation to proceed to treatment

Our cosmetic dentistry services are designed to retain the uniqueness of your smile whilst improving the appearance of your teeth. We will advise which procedures can rejuvenate your teeth and create an individualised treatment plan to suit your dental needs and meet your aspirations.

We offer our patients the following cosmetic dentistry solutions:

  • Teeth Whitening – to remove discolouration and target dullness
  • Veneers – to completely transform the appearance of your teeth
  • White Fillings – so you can receive essential treatment without the worry of this being seen by others
  • Orthodontic Treatment – to improve the alignment of your teeth

We are pleased to offer our patients a range of finance options. This means that you can pay for treatments in instalments, over a period of time, which can help to ease the burden of a one-off payment.

Please click here or call +41/44 222 21 11 to book your appointment

treatment_5.title: Veneers
treatment_5.description:
Dental veneers can transform your smile. They are used on the front teeth to make your smile more symmetrical and much brighter than before. This cosmetic dentistry treatment creates a lasting impact and is hugely popular.

At Eram Dental Health Clinic, as well as making sure your teeth and gums are as healthy as possible, we want our patients to feel happy and confident when they smile. That’s why veneers are a great option for people who are unhappy with the appearance of their teeth and want to avoid multiple treatments.

A dental veneer acts as a ‘cap’ or cover for the front teeth. Each veneer is individually manufactured by our expert laboratory team.

Dental veneers are made of porcelain and can be used to restore the appearance of teeth that have been damaged, are heavily stained or discoloured and to restore wide gaps in the teeth. They can be used on a single tooth or multiple teeth depending on your dental needs.

The procedure

You can leave Eram Dental Health Clinic with a new, beautiful smile in just two visits.

Once you have chosen this cosmetic procedure, we will prepare your front teeth by removing a thin layer of dental enamel to create the ideal bonding surface for the veneer.

We will take impressions of your teeth and help you to choose the exact shade of veneer for your new teeth. We will send the impressions and information to our laboratory who will start the building process.

At the next visit, your dentist will first show you how the veneers look. Once you are happy with their appearance, the veneers will be bonded into place. These are long-lasting and durable cosmetic enhancements and we will show you how to care for them.

We are pleased to offer our patients a range of finance options. This means that you can pay for treatments in instalments, over a period of time, which can help to ease the burden of a one-off payment.

Please click here or call +41/44 222 21 11 to book your appointment

treatment_6.title: White Fillings
treatment_6.description:
A white filling gives you the option to receive essential treatment without it being noticeable or visible to others.

Most adults will need at least one if not more fillings at some stage or another and with white fillings you can feel confident that your treatment is subtle yet effective.

Decay eats away at healthy enamel and causes cavities or holes. If the cavity is left untreated it can grow in size and leave the inside of a tooth vulnerable to infection. A tooth that has been affected by decay may also feel more sensitive than usual.

At Eram Dental Health Clinic, we offer patients white fillings made from composite resin or porcelain. White fillings are barely visible once applied to the tooth, so many of our patients prefer this option to traditional metal fillings.

The procedure

If you require a filling, we will discuss the best option for you and at the next appointment we will start the treatment.

The affected tooth will be cleaned and the damaged enamel removed. The white filling will then be used to fill the cavity and prevent further damage to the natural tooth.

Our dental team will be happy to advise you about cleaning techniques and how to avoid the need for further fillings.

Please click here or call +41/44 222 21 11 to book your appointment
